  • Class
    Description
    InitState
    Initial state of the TUI.
    JoinedToGameState
    TUIstate that represents the state of the TUI when the client is joined to a game which is not started yet.
    PlayingState
    TUIstate in which the player can play the running game.

    Text User Interface class that manages the text interface of the game

    TUIstate
    Abstract class that represents the state of the TUI.
